channel.title: Comments for page "Bruce Sr Lvl 2"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bruce Sr Lvl 2"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, that's what I was thinking, you can beat an opponent on the turf. As you haven't beaten the other boss, it wouldn't be considered a turf, yet. So, I'm guessing, all the ally level-ups work the same way as Mr Smith, but you have a choice of which one to fight on to level, instead of having to do playground. Good to know.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You can get him again on either one, but you have to have beaten the boss for that specific area.

So if you've beaten one boss but not the other, you can only level him up in the area you've defeated already.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Once you've beaten one of the two bosses, can you get him by beating an opponent on the appropriate turf, as with Mr Smith, or do you have to have beaten both bosses for that to work?
